Replies.Author: Daniel Pascua
Replies.Content: I don’t have any other little things to add, so I’ll just mention that Kuroneko is the best character, like this post tells me to.

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content:
Kuroneko does NOT in fact look almost exactly like Suigintou. I mean, apart from the fact that they are both Goth-Loli. Seriously, aren’t all of them look like that?

Btw, I’m not 100% sure cause of Hazama, but it looks like, “My Little Dog (or Puppy) Can’t Be This Cute.”

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content: [OK, maybe not “exactly”](http://i55.tinypic.com/zufvah.png) but the comparison was drawn on purpose. I can’t classify them as all looking the same, but comparers gonna compare.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
Kuroneko is the best character, I don’t know what you guys are talking about.

Looking forward to more of these. Interesting read!
